Package multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop

Class BaseToggleButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JToggleButton
              • multidendrograms.forms.scrollabledesktop.BaseToggleButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants, DesktopConstants, FrameAccessorInterface
    public class BaseToggleButton
extends javax.swing.JToggleButton
implements DesktopConstants, FrameAccessorInterface
    This class creates a base toggle button. A BaseInternalFrame object is associated with every instance of this class.
    Version:
    1.0 11-Aug-2001
    Author:
    Tom Tessier
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • flagContentsChanged

        public void flagContentsChanged​(boolean changed)
        flags the contents as "changed" by setting the foreground color to CONTENTS_CHANGED_COLOR. Used to notify the user when the contents of an inactive internal frame have changed.
        Parameters:
        changed - boolean indicating whether contents have changed
